name: Unown Y
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

abilities.name: [Yield]
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a {P} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon with Unown in its name. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can be used even if Unown Y is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
